descriptions.text: 1 handbag/laptop bag per person Up to 56cm x 45cm x 25cm/22in x 18in x 10in.
To be placed under the seat in front of you*. Up to 40cm x 30cm x 15cm/16in x 12in x 6in.
Plus 1 additional cabin bag per person
You must be able to lift your bag unaided into the overhead locker*.
Allowances for children and infants
In addition to their baggage allowance infants and children, up to age 11, can also take one fully collapsible pushchair (stroller) and one car seat.
You have selected a hand baggage only fare
No checked baggage allowance for any passengers
Buy checked baggage allowances later
Checked baggage allowances can be bought for an additional cost in Manage My Booking at any time after you have booked your flight(s).
Hand baggage allowance
restrictions on what you can pack
Extra baggage allowance charges

restrictions on what you can pack
Extra baggage allowance charges
There are restrictions on what you may pack and on the dimensions of your bags.
You may be charged for extra or overweight bags.
Baggage essentials

penalties.description: Time/date changes permitted at any time before each flight departure for a change fee of EUR 70 or an upgrade fee of EUR 70 plus any difference in fare. All sectors may be repriced. Changes subject to availability. Fees apply per ticket

Time/date changes permitted at any time before each flight departure for a change fee of EUR 70 or an upgrade fee of EUR 70 plus any difference in fare. All sectors may be repriced. Changes subject to availability. Fees apply per ticket
There are no refunds except for any government & airport taxes.
